about_the_game:
MOON THIRST - A lonely ancient vampire who was banished into the tangled and dangerous dark forests by the forces of ancient magicians. Left without your normal strength, you must explore cursed forests, encounter and defeat various enemies and creatures, and go through various trials and traps to try to regain your power and strength.

As you journey through dark paths and ravines, you discover your true identity as a vampire and overcome your inner battles to reclaim your place in this world or be consumed by the darkness forever. Can you defeat the ancient magicians and reclaim your place in the world of the living, or will you have to accept your fate and be forever banished into darkness?

The game combines RPG and Roguelite elements. You will find yourself in a vast location where your goal is to move forward by completing tasks. Traveling along dark paths, you will have to destroy enemies and solve riddles to restore your power.

Prepare for an exciting adventure in a world of darkness, where dangers, challenges and the opportunity to conquer your own demons await you to reclaim your place among the living.
